AllowlistDeployed(address,address,addres.details: Event emitted when upgradable AllowlistUpgradeable is deployed

params.implementation: The address for the implementation contract
params.proxy: The address for the proxy contract
params.proxyAdmin: The address for the proxy admin contract

deployAllowlist(address,address).details: This function will deploy an upgradable instance of AllowlistUpgradeable

params.admin: The admin account for the AllowlistUpgradeable contract.
params.setter: The setter account for the AllowlistUpgradeable contract.

returns._0: address The address of the proxy contract.
returns._1: address The address of the proxyAdmin contract.
returns._2: address The address of the implementation contract.

multiexcall((address,bytes,uint256)[]).details: All external calls made through this function will      msg.sender == contract address

params.exCallData: Struct consisting of       1) target - contract to call       2) data - data to call target with       3) value - eth value to call target with

userdoc.notice: This contract serves as a Factory for the upgradable AllowlistUpgradeable contract.         Upon calling `deployAllowlist` the `guardian` address (set in constructor) will         deploy the following:         1) AllowlistUpgradeable - The implementation contract.         2) ProxyAdmin - OZ ProxyAdmin contract, used to upgrade the proxy instance.Owner is set to `guardian` address.         3) TransparentUpgradeableProxy - OZ, proxy contract. Admin is set to `address(proxyAdmin)`.                                          `_logic' is set to `address(cash)`.`guardian` address in constructor is a msig.
